member.name: T:NPOI.HPSF.Extractor.HPSFPropertiesExtractor
member.summary: Extracts all of the HPSF properties, both build in and custom, returning them in textual form.

member.name: M:NPOI.POITextExtractor.#ctor(NPOI.POIDocument)
member.summary: Creates a new text extractor for the given document

member.name: M:NPOI.POITextExtractor.#ctor(NPOI.POITextExtractor)
member.summary: Creates a new text extractor, using the same document as another text extractor. Normally only used by properties extractors.

member.name: P:NPOI.POITextExtractor.Text
member.summary: Retrieves all the text from the document. How cells, paragraphs etc are separated in the text is implementation specific - see the javadocs for a specific project for details.
member.value: All the text from the document.

member.name: P:NPOI.POITextExtractor.MetadataTextExtractor
member.summary: Returns another text extractor, which is able to output the textual content of the document metadata / properties, such as author and title.

member.name: M:NPOI.HPSF.Extractor.HPSFPropertiesExtractor.GetPropertiesText(NPOI.HPSF.SpecialPropertySet)
member.summary: Gets the properties text.

member.name: M:NPOI.HPSF.Extractor.HPSFPropertiesExtractor.GetPropertyValueText(System.Object)
member.summary: Gets the property value text.

member.name: P:NPOI.HPSF.Extractor.HPSFPropertiesExtractor.DocumentSummaryInformationText
member.summary: Gets the document summary information text.

member.name: P:NPOI.HPSF.Extractor.HPSFPropertiesExtractor.SummaryInformationText
member.summary: Gets the summary information text.

member.name: P:NPOI.HPSF.Extractor.HPSFPropertiesExtractor.Text
member.summary: Return the text of all the properties defined in the document.
member.value: All the text from the document.

member.name: P:NPOI.HPSF.Extractor.HPSFPropertiesExtractor.MetadataTextExtractor
member.summary: Returns another text extractor, which is able to output the textual content of the document metadata / properties, such as author and title.

member.name: T:NPOI.HPSF.Extractor.HPSFPropertiesExtractor.PropertiesOnlyDocument
member.summary: So we can get at the properties of any random OLE2 document.

member.name: T:NPOI.POIDocument
member.summary: This holds the common functionality for all POI Document classes. Currently, this relates to Document Information Properties

members.member: Holds further metadata on our document
The open POIFS FileSystem that contains our document
The directory that our document lives in

member.name: M:NPOI.POIDocument.#ctor(NPOI.POIFS.FileSystem.DirectoryNode,NPOI.POIFS.FileSystem.POIFSFileSystem)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:NPOI.POIDocument.#ctor(NPOI.POIFS.FileSystem.POIFSFileSystem)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:NPOI.POIDocument.ReadProperties
member.summary: Find, and Create objects for, the standard Documment Information Properties (HPSF). If a given property Set is missing or corrupt, it will remain null;

member.name: M:NPOI.POIDocument.GetPropertySet(System.String)
member.summary: For a given named property entry, either return it or null if if it wasn't found

member.name: M:NPOI.POIDocument.WriteProperties(NPOI.POIFS.FileSystem.POIFSFileSystem)
member.summary: Writes out the standard Documment Information Properties (HPSF)
member.param: the POIFSFileSystem to Write the properties into

member.name: M:NPOI.POIDocument.WriteProperties(NPOI.POIFS.FileSystem.POIFSFileSystem,System.Collections.IList)
member.summary: Writes out the standard Documment Information Properties (HPSF)
member.param: the POIFSFileSystem to Write the properties into.
a list of POIFS entries to Add the property names too.

member.name: M:NPOI.POIDocument.WritePropertySet(System.String,NPOI.HPSF.PropertySet,NPOI.POIFS.FileSystem.POIFSFileSystem)
member.summary: Writes out a given ProperySet
member.param: the (POIFS Level) name of the property to Write.
the POIFSFileSystem to Write the property into.

member.name: M:NPOI.POIDocument.Write(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Writes the document out to the specified output stream

member.name: M:NPOI.POIDocument.CopyNodes(NPOI.POIFS.FileSystem.POIFSFileSystem,NPOI.POIFS.FileSystem.POIFSFileSystem,System.Collections.IList)
member.summary: Copies nodes from one POIFS to the other minus the excepts
member.param: the source POIFS to copy from.
the target POIFS to copy to
a list of Strings specifying what nodes NOT to copy

member.name: M:NPOI.POIDocument.isInList(System.String,System.Collections.IList)
member.summary: Checks to see if the String is in the list, used when copying nodes between one POIFS and another
member.returns: true if [is in list] [the specified entry]; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:NPOI.POIDocument.CopyNodeRecursively(NPOI.POIFS.FileSystem.Entry,NPOI.POIFS.FileSystem.DirectoryEntry)
member.summary: Copies an Entry into a target POIFS directory, recursively

member.name: P:NPOI.POIDocument.DocumentSummaryInformation
member.summary: Fetch the Document Summary Information of the document

member.name: P:NPOI.POIDocument.SummaryInformation
member.summary: Fetch the Summary Information of the document

member.name: T:NPOI.POIOLE2TextExtractor
member.summary: Common Parent for OLE2 based Text Extractors of POI Documents, such as .doc, .xls You will typically find the implementation of a given format's text extractor under NPOI.Format.Extractor

member.name: M:NPOI.POIOLE2TextExtractor.#ctor(NPOI.POIDocument)
member.summary: Creates a new text extractor for the given document

member.name: P:NPOI.POIOLE2TextExtractor.DocSummaryInformation
member.summary: Returns the document information metadata for the document

member.name: P:NPOI.POIOLE2TextExtractor.SummaryInformation
member.summary: Returns the summary information metadata for the document

member.name: P:NPOI.POIOLE2TextExtractor.MetadataTextExtractor
member.summary: Returns an HPSF powered text extractor for the document properties metadata, such as title and author.
